member.name: T:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for writing data to a channel.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.AsChannel``1(System.Data.IDataReader,System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Iterates an IDataReader through the transform function and writes each record to a channel. Be sure to await the completion.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The IDataReader to iterate.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
True will cause the resultant reader to optimize for the assumption that no concurrent read operations will occur.
The optional bounded capacity of the channel. Default is unbound.
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.AsChannel``1(System.Data.IDataReader,System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Iterates an IDataReader through the transform function and writes each record to an unbound channel. Be sure to await the completion.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The IDataReader to iterate.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
True will cause the resultant reader to optimize for the assumption that no concurrent read operations will occur.
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.AsChannel``1(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Iterates an IDataReader through the transform function and writes each record to a channel. Be sure to await the completion.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The IDataReader to iterate.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
True will cause the resultant reader to optimize for the assumption that no concurrent read operations will occur.
The optional bounded capacity of the channel. Default is unbound.
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.AsChannel``1(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Iterates an IDataReader through the transform function and writes each record to a channel. Be sure to await the completion.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The IDataReader to iterate.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
True will cause the resultant reader to optimize for the assumption that no concurrent read operations will occur.
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.AsChannel``1(Open.Database.Extensions.IExecuteReader,System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Iterates an IDataReader through the transform function and writes each record to a channel. Be sure to await the completion.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The IDataReader to iterate.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
True will cause the resultant reader to optimize for the assumption that no concurrent read operations will occur.
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.ToChannel``1(System.Data.IDataReader,System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter{``0},System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Iterates an IDataReader through the transform function and writes each record to the channel.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The IDataReader to iterate.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
The target block to receive the results.
If true, will call .Complete() if all the results have successfully been written (or the source is emtpy).
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.ToChannel``1(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter{``0},System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously iterates an IDataReader and through the transform function and posts each record it to the target block. If a connection is desired to remain open after completion, you must open the connection before calling this method. If the connection is already open, the reading will commence immediately. Otherwise this will yield to the caller.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The DbCommand to generate a reader from.
The target block to receive the results.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
If true, will call .Complete() if all the results have successfully been written (or the source is emtpy).
An optional cancellation token.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ChannelExtensions.ToChannel``1(Open.Database.Extensions.IExecuteReader,System.Threading.Channels.ChannelWriter{``0},System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously iterates an IDataReader and through the transform function and posts each record it to the target block. If a connection is desired to remain open after completion, you must open the connection before calling this method. If the connection is already open, the reading will commence immediately. Otherwise this will yield to the caller.
member.typeparam: The return type of the transform function.
member.param: The command to generate a reader from.
The target channel writer to receive the results.
The transform function for each IDataRecord.
An optional cancellation token.
